name: Trash Dash (lewis.foxall)
description:
Trash Dash is a slapstick comedy virtual reality cooking experience for HTC Vive and Oculus. A cooking game for all the family with ever-changing ingredients, situational and customers

Trash Dash is a VR game where the player plays as a Raccoon, Raheem, that starts a culinary business in the back of a bin van. 

Raheem offers a service to all the animals of the city; he cooks with the thrash dropped in the back of the van and transform it into tasty dishes for customers.
